overview:
Dayne Myers is Chief Executive Officer of Gehry Technologies.

Dayne has served as chief executive officer of Gehry Technologies since October, 2009. He has extensive experience in management consulting and venture management, including more than fifteen years as CEO of early stage technology companies. Prior to joining GT, Dayne was founder & CEO of Imagine Sports, a fantasy sports internet game company that he started in 2005. Before starting Imagine Sports, Dayne was co-founder and CEO of Elemental Cyber Security (www.elementalsecurity.com), a network security software provider backed by Sequoia Capital, Bessemer Ventures, and Mayfield that was selected as both a Red Herring 100 and AlwaysOn 100 company. He led Elemental through three rounds of financing and the development of its signature product, the Elemental Compliance System, which won numerous awards, including Info Security magazineâ€™s New Technology of the Year in 2005.

Prior to Elemental, Dayne was interim CEO of Infinity I/O (www.infinityio.com), a provider of technical training for storage networking, and Walden Laboratories, Inc., an early-stage venture-backed biotech company, where he served as CEO from 1991 until a successful exit in 1995. His career also includes several years as a management consultant at McKinsey & Company (www.mckinsey.com).
